translations.text: Tanzeelul Kitaabi minal laahil Azeezil Hakeem

translations.text: Maa khalaqnas samaawaati wal-arda Wa-maa bainahumaaa illaa bilhaqqi Wa-ajalim musammaa; wallazeena kafaroo 'ammaaa unziroo mu'ridoon

translations.text: Qul ara'aytum maa tad'oona min doonil laahi aroonee maazaa khalaqoo minal ardi am lahum shirkun fis samaawaati eetoonee bi-kitaabim min qabli haazaaa aw asaaratim min ilmin in kuntum saadiqeen

translations.text: Wa-man adallu mimmaien yad'oo min doonil laahi mal laa yastajeebu lahooo ilaa Yawmil Qiyaamati Wa-hum 'an du'aaa'ihim ghaafiloon

translations.text: Wa-izaa tutlaa alaihim Aayaatunaa baiyinaatin qaalal lazeena kafaroo lilhaqqi lammaa jaaa'ahum haazaa sihrum mubeen

translations.text: Am yaqooloonaf taraahu qul inif taraituhoo falaa tamlikoona lee minal laahi shai'an Huwa a'lamu bimaa tufeedoona feehi kafaa bihee shaheedam bainee Wa-bainakum Wa-Huwal Ghafoorur Raheem

translations.text: Qul maa kuntu bid'am minal Rusuli Wa-maaa adreee ma yuf'alu bee Wa-laa bikum in attabi'u illaa maa yoohaaa ilaiya Wa-maaa ana illaa nazeerum mubeen

translations.text: Wa-min qablihee kitaabu Moosaaa imaamanw wa-rahmah; Wa-haazaa Kitaabum musad-diqul lisaanan Arabiyyal liyunziral lazeena zalamoo Wa-bushraa lilmuhsineen

translations.text: Wa-likullin darajaatum mimmaa amiloo Wa-liyuwaf-fiyahum a'maalahum Wa-hum laa yuzlamoon

translations.text: Wazkur akhaa 'Aadin iz anzara qawmahoo bil-Ahqaafi Wa-qad khalatin nuzuru mim baini yadaihi Wa-min khalfiheee allaa ta'budooo illal laaha inneee akhaafu alaikum 'azaaba Yawmin 'azeem

translations.text: Qaaloo aji'tanaa li-taa-fikanaa 'an aalihatinaa fa'tinaa bimaa ta'idunaaa in kunta minas saadiqeen

translations.text: Falammaa ra-awhu aaridam mustaqbila awdiyatihim qaaloo haazaa aaridum mumtirunaa; bal huwa mas ta'jaltum bihee reehun feehaa 'azaabun aleem

translations.text: Tudammiru kulla shai'im bi-amri Rabbihaa fa-asbahoo laa yuraaa illaa masaakinuhum; kazaalika najzil qawmal mujrimeen

translations.text: Wa-laqad makkannaahum feemaaa im makkannaakum feehi waj'alnaa lahum sam'anw Wa-absaaranw Wa-af'idatan famaaa aghnaa 'anhum sam'uhum Wa-laaa absaaruhum Wa-laaa af'idatuhum min shai'in iz kaanoo yajhadoona bi-Aayaatil laahi Wa-haaqa bihim maa kaanoo bihee yastahzi'oon

words.en: And certainly||We destroyed||what||surrounds you||of||the towns||and We have diversified||the Signs||that they may||return

translations.text: Wa-laqad ahlaknaa ma hawlakum minal quraa Wa-sarrafnal Aayaati la'allahum yarji'oon

words.id: maka mengapa tidak||menolong mereka||orang-orang yang||mereka jadikan||dari||selain||Allah||pendekatan diri||Tuhan||tetapi||lenyap||dari mereka||dan itulah||kebohongan mereka||dan apa yang||mereka adalah||mereka ada-adakan

translations.text: Falaw-laa nasarahumul lazeenat takhazoo min doonil laahi qurbaanan aalihatam bal dalloo 'anhum' Wa-zaalika ifkuhum Wa-maa kaanoo yaftaroon

words.id: dan ketika||Kami hadapkan||kepadamu||golongan/rombongan||dari||jin||mereka mendengarkan||Al Qur'an||maka tatkala||mereka menghadirinya||mareka berkata||diamlah kamu||maka tatkala||telah selesai||dan mereka kembali||kepada||kaumnya||orang-orang yanng memberi peringatan

translations.text: Wa-iz sarafinaaa ilaika nafaram minal jinni yastami'oonal Quraana falammaa hadaroohu qaalooo ansitoo falammaa qudiya wallaw ilaa qawmihim munzireen

words.id: mereka berkata||hai kaum kami||sesungguhnya kami||kami telah mendengarkan||kitab||diturunkan||dari||sesudah||Musa||membenarkan||terhadap apa||antara||sebelumnya||memberi petunjuk||kepada||kebenaran||dan kepada||jalan||lurus

translations.text: Qaaloo yaa-qawmanaaa innaa sami'naa Kitaaban unzila mim ba'di Moosa musaddiqal limaa baina yadihi yahdeee ilal haqqi Wa-ilaa Tareeqim Mustaqeem

words.en: O our people!||Respond||(to the) caller||(of) Allah||and believe||in him||He will forgive||for you||of||your sins||and will protect you||from||a punishment||painful

translations.text: Yaa-qawmanaaa ajeeboo daa'iyal laahi Wa-aaminoo bihee yaghfir lakum min zunoobikum Wa-yujirkum min azaabin aleem

words.id: dan barang siapa||tidak||memenuhi||orang yang menyeru||Allah||maka tidaklah ia||menyelamatkan||di muka||bumi||dan tidak ia||baginya||dari||selain Dia||pelindung||mereka itu||dalam||kesesatan||nyata

translations.text: Wa-mal laa yujib daa'iyal laahi falaisa bimu'jizin fil ardi Wa-laisa lahoo min dooniheee awliyaaa'; ulaaa-ika fee dalaalim mubeen

words.id: ataukah tidak||mereka memperhatikan||bahwasanya||Allah||yang||menciptakan||langit(jamak)||dan bumi||dan tidak||Dia merasa payah||dengan menciptakannya||berkuasa||atas||bahwa||menghidupkan||orang mati||ya/benar||sesungguhnya||atas||segala||sesuatu||Maha Kuasa
words.en: Do not||they see||that||Allah||(is) the One Who||created||the heavens||and the earth||and (did) not||get tired||by their creation||(is) able||to give life||to give life||to give life||(to) the dead||Yes||indeed He||(is) on||every||thing||All-Powerful

translations.text: Awalam yaraw annal laahal lazee khalaqas samaawaati wal-arda Wa-lam ya'ya bikhalqihinna biqaadirin 'alaaa ai yuhyiyal mawtaa; balaaa innahoo 'alaa kulli shai'in Qadeer

words.id: dan pada hari||dihadapkan||orang-orang yang||kafir/ingkar||ke||neraka||bukankah||ini||dengan benar||mereka berkata||ya/benar||dan demi Tuhan kami||Dia berkata||maka rasakan||azab||sebab||kalian adalah||kalian kafir
words.en: And (the) Day||are exposed||those who||disbelieved||to||the Fire||Is not||this||the truth||They will say||Yes||by our Lord||He will say||Then taste||the punishment||because||you used (to)||disbelieve

translations.text: Wa-Yawma yu'radul lazeena kafaroo 'alan naari alaisa haaza bil-haqq; qaaloo balaa Wa-Rabbinaa; qaala fazooqul 'azaaba bimaa kuntum takfuroon

words.id: maka bersabarlah kamu||sebagaimana||bersabar||orang-orang yang mempunyai||keteguhan hati||dari||rasul-rasul||dan jangan||kamu minta disegerakan||bagi mereka||seakan-akan mereka||pada hari||mereka melihat||apa yang||mereka diancam||tidak||mereka tinggal||kecuali||sesaat||dari||siang hari||penjelasan||maka tidaklah||dibinasakan||kecuali||kaum||orang-orang yang fasik
words.en: So be patient||as||had patience||those of determination||those of determination||of||the Messengers||and (do) not||seek to hasten||for them||As if they had||(the) Day||they see||what||they were promised||not||remained||except||an hour||of||a day||A clear Message||But will||(any) be destroyed||except||the people||the defiantly disobedient

translations.text: Fasbir kamaa sabara ulul azmi minar Rusuli Wa-laa tasta'jil lahum; ka-annahum Yawma yarawna maa yoo'adoona lam yalbasooo illaa saa'atam min nahaar; balaagh; fahal yuhlaku illal qawmul faasiqoon
